src_original: buddho hi saṁyojanavipramuktaḥ 7// // Section 8 Wal_8.1 atha bhagavata etad abhavad /
Wal_8.2 adhigato me dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo duranubodhaḥ atarkyo ’tarkyāvacara sūkṣmo nipuṇa paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ /

Wal_8.3 taṁ cāhaṁ pareṣām ārocayeyaṁ taṁ ca pare na vijānīyus sa mama syād vighātaḥ syāt klamathaḥ syāc cetaso ’nudaya eva / yanv aham ekākī araṇye pravaṇe dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogaṁ anuyukto vihareyam iti / Wal_8.4 iti tatra bhagavata alpotsukavihāratāyāṁ cittaṁ krāmati na dharmadeśanāyām /
Wal_8.5 atha brahmaṇaḥ sabhāpater etad abhavat /
Wal_8.6 vinaśyati batāyaṁ lokaḥ praṇaśyati batāyaṁ lokaḥ yatredānīṁ kadācit karhicit tathāgatā
arhantaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhā loke utpadyante tadyathā udumbarapuṣpam / tasya cādya bhagavata alpotsukavihāratāyāṁ cittaṁ krāmati na dharmadeśanāyām / yanv ahaṁ gatvā adhyeṣeyaṁ /
Wal_8.7 atha brahmā sabhāpatis tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṁmiṁjitaṁ vā bāhuṁ prasārayet prasāritaṁ vā saṁmiṁjayed evam eva brahmā sabhāpatir brahmaloke ’ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthād /
Wal_8.8 atha brahmā sabhāpatis tasyām velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe /
vadasva dharmaṁ virajānubuddham // Wal_8.10 atha bhagavāṁs tasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ babhāṣe /
